mapper.sql: we_chat_access_token_.access_token AS we_chat_access_token_access_token, we_chat_access_token_.corp_id AS we_chat_access_token_corp_id, we_chat_access_token_.corp_secret AS we_chat_access_token_corp_secret, we_chat_access_token_.create_time AS we_chat_access_token_create_time, we_chat_access_token_.expires_in AS we_chat_access_token_expires_in, we_chat_access_token_.id AS we_chat_access_token_id, we_chat_access_token_.remark AS we_chat_access_token_remark, we_chat_access_token_.response AS we_chat_access_token_response, we_chat_access_token_.state AS we_chat_access_token_state, we_chat_access_token_.update_time AS we_chat_access_token_update_time, we_chat_access_token_.version AS we_chat_access_token_version
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_we_chat_access_token ( access_token, corp_id, corp_secret, create_time, expires_in, remark, response, state, version ) VALUES ( #{weChatAccessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpSecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expiresIn,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{response,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
